channel.title: [/UTORRENT/]Am i doing it right?[/UTORRENT/]
channel.description:
alright, so i downloaded utorrent, so that i could Download NCIS season 5 epsiode 1-18, and season 6, epsiode 1-25 for my mom and i was wondering if i was doing it right..
i downloaded it off of this website:
http://www.kickasstorrents.com/ncis-season-5-episodes-1-18-complete-t1027368.html (Seasons 5, 1-18)
http://www.demonoid.com/files/details/1935927/?show_files=1&page=1&ref=1243350772 (Seasons 6, 1-25)
i'm using mozilla firefox, once it was done downloading, it opened up and it came up with a window that said to download selected files and i clicked yes..the download is going VERY slow, and i was just wondering is i was doing it right. here is a picture: ======================================================================================================================== [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/torrent.jpg[/img]
======================================================================================================================== plz post and tell me if i'm doing it right or wrong..thanks!

item.title: [/UTORRENT/]Am i doing it right?[/UTORRENT/]
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:5, topic:285819”][quote author=jme link=topic=378008.msg2844326#msg2844326 date=1246181618]
Yeah those torrents have more way more leechers than seeders. You should use a private tracker.
[/quote]
Its still a decent torrent! You hit 473KB/s which is pretty nice for a torrent.
Better than what I normally get.[/quote]
LOL really? i get 2MB/s as my average
